PersonalStatement.text: James Simon, born on 1986-11-18, is a Female based in South Kristinaberg, China. She is Divorced and holds Kenyan nationality. Currently working at Miller PLC.

WorkExperience.text: Financial Analyst at Moore-Rodriguez from 2013 to 2019.
Senior Systems Administrator at Miller PLC, 2023 to present.

Master's in Engineering from Vancouver Island University

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys hiking.
